item.title: Firefighters report progress against LA blazes as winds pick up again
item.description: Millions of Southern Californians are nervously keeping watch as winds begin picking up during a final round of dangerous wildfire weather forecast for the region.

item.title: Firefighters need better weather to fight Californiaâ€™s flames. When will they get relief?
Relief, 21st-century style: As wildfires burn, GoFundMe becomes a repository of harrowing stories
